text: So glad that you are having such a lovely time, dearie, it ran. Your cards are lovely. I rang up Miss Harland and have been over to sit with her father and do what pretty helpless still with his broken arm.
handwritten_text: So glad that you are having such a lovely time, dearie, it ran. Your cards are lovely. I rang up Miss Harland and have been over to sit with her father and do what pretty helpless still with his broken arm.
